statements: SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE plant_species = 'Rose';
SELECT trait_name, plant_species FROM plant_traits WHERE genetic_marker = 'ABC123';
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE trait_description LIKE '%color%';
SELECT plant_species, trait_name FROM plant_traits WHERE trait_name = 'Flower Color';
SELECT trait_name, plant_species, trait_description FROM plant_traits WHERE plant_species = 'Sunflower' AND genetic_marker = 'DEF456' ORDER BY trait_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE plant_species = 'Rose' ORDER BY trait_name DESC;
SELECT trait_name, plant_species FROM plant_traits WHERE genetic_marker LIKE '%ABC%' AND trait_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(trait_id) AS total_traits, plant_species FROM plant_traits GROUP BY plant_species HAVING total_traits > 3;
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE trait_name IN ('Height', 'Color', 'Weight') AND plant_species = 'Sunflower';
SELECT trait_description, genetic_marker FROM plant_traits WHERE trait_name = 'Leaf Shape' OR plant_species = 'Tulip';
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, trait_associated FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers WHERE marker_id = 1;
SELECT marker_name, trait_associated, marker_id FROM genetic_markers;
SELECT trait_name, plant_name, trait_description FROM plant_traits;
SELECT trait_id, trait_name, plant_name, trait_description FROM plant_traits WHERE plant_name = 'Rose';
SELECT * FROM genetic_markers
SELECT marker_id, marker_name FROM genetic_markers ORDER BY marker_id DESC
SELECT marker_name, trait_associated FROM genetic_markers WHERE trait_associated = 'Height'
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE plant_name = 'Rose' ORDER BY trait_id ASC
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM plant_traits
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE marker_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, position FROM plant_markers WHERE chromosome_id = 3;
SELECT parent_id, generation FROM plant_genealogy WHERE generation > 2;
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE trait_name = 'Flowering Time';
SELECT marker_id, chromosome_id, gene_name FROM plant_markers WHERE gene_name LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE trait_name = 'Flowering Time';
SELECT marker_id, trait_name FROM plant_traits WHERE marker_id = 1;
SELECT parent_id, generation FROM plant_genealogy WHERE generation > 3 ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM plant_markers WHERE chromosome_id = 3 ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT plant_id, parent_id, generation FROM plant_genealogy WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Plants
SELECT id, plant_name, marker_id FROM Plants
SELECT trait, marker_id FROM Plants WHERE plant_name = 'Rose'
SELECT DISTINCT plant_name FROM Plants
SELECT p.plant_name, t.trait_name, ma.marker_id FROM Plants p JOIN MarkerAssociation ma ON p.marker_id = ma.marker_id JOIN Traits t ON t.id = ma.trait_id
SELECT * FROM Plants WHERE trait='Flowering' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT plant_name, trait, marker_id FROM Plants WHERE marker_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT trait_name, description FROM Traits WHERE description LIKE '%genetic%';
SELECT * FROM GeneticMarkers ORDER BY marker_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT m.marker_name, t.trait_name FROM GeneticMarkers m JOIN MarkerAssociation ma ON m.id = ma.marker_id JOIN Traits t ON ma.trait_id = t.id;
SELECT * FROM plant_traits;
SELECT plant_name, trait FROM plant_traits WHERE id = 5;
SELECT scientist_name, specialty FROM scientist;
SELECT marker_name, chromosome_no, location FROM marker_info WHERE chromosome_no > 5;
SELECT plant_name, trait, genetic_marker FROM plant_traits ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, trait FROM plant_traits WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT marker_name, chromosome_no FROM marker_info;
SELECT scientist_name, specialty FROM scientist WHERE specialty = 'Genetics';
SELECT * FROM plant_traits WHERE plant_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY trait DESC;
SELECT scientist_name, category_name FROM scientist JOIN trait_category ON scientist.specialty = trait_category.category_name;
